comments.body: Shouldn't this still be in `.metals/readonly` or is it relative now? I commented on this in another file as well, but it might be clearer to just have the full path.

They still are in `.metals/readonly` but the path became much longer - `.metals/readonly/dependencies/sbt-${version}-sources.jar/sbt/Keys.scala`.
Honestly, it was easier to fix tests by leaving these paths without full prefix than investigating the right one per every test. Anyway, there isn't a lot of meaning in seeing them.

Also, I think it might be annoying to update jar names in these paths in case if some dependency version will be changed in tests
